#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    
    int a,num,b,arr[3000],i,temp,x,j;
    scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
    num=a;
    for(i=0;num>0;i++,num/=10)
    {
                      arr[i]=num%10;
    }
    i--;
    //got number of lenght i+1 in array
    while(b>1)
    {
              //mutiply each number by array
              for(temp=0,j=0;j<=i;j++)
              {
                                      x=arr[j]*a+temp;
                                      arr[j]=x%10;
                                      temp=x/10;
              }
              while(temp>0)
              {
                        arr[j]=temp%10;
                        temp=temp/10;
                        j++;
              }
              i=j-1;
           b--;
    }
    temp=0;
    for(i=j-1;i>=0;i--)
    {
                       printf("%d",arr[i]);
                       temp+=arr[i];
    }
    printf("\n%d",temp);
    return 0;
}
